synopsis.p: Writes the corpus in XMI format using the AlvisNLP/ML proxy typesystem.

description.p: writes a file for each document in outDir in the XMI format using the AlvisNLP/ML proxy typesystem.
Files written by this module can be read by XMIImport

param-doc.name: typeSystemFile
param-doc.p: If set write the AlvisNLP/ML proxy typesystem into the specified file.

param-doc.name: outDir
param-doc.p: Directory where to write XMI files.
